thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Alice, Cheltenham
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Alice, Cheltenham

author: Alice, Cheltenham
title: Alice, Cheltenham
text:
Amazing service. Received the product in lovely packaging and wrapped up professionally as this was a birthday present. Was asked if I wanted to also receive a gift note with the product to which I said yes and typed out what I wanted it to say - I was overly impressed when the product turned up along with a HANDWRITTEN card in a proper envelope with the name of my sister on the front! An amazing and charming extra bit of effort that was put in.
Alongside all this, I received the product in a very reasonable time frame - Ordered on Thursday and received the following Monday!
The product itself was beautiful - exactly what I ordered and came safely in a little box.
Thank you for the product and the experience, I would definitely recommend this to any friend, relative or acquaintance.
